text: hey everybody its Dave and Deb and we
are in Banff Alberta Canada
now you can't visit a winter destination
in my opinion without trying dog
sledding I think it's the quintessential
Canadian experience and the only place
you can do it in Banff National Park is
at Kingman and we even got to go into
British Columbia so if you're visiting
Canada over the first time you'll get
two provinces in one trip
speaking of quintessentially Canadian
what is more Canadian than going out and
playing a game of pond hockey we are
lucky enough to go out with Bill from
Wilson Mountain Sports
and put our hockey skills to the test
all I have to do is go rent your gear
Wilson Mountain Sports French everything
you need you can get your skates your
pucks and then you just head on over to
Lake Louise and join a game of pick-up
hockey right in front of the Fairmont
Hotel pretty Canadian a
one of another great adventure is you
want to get up really far into the
mountains the best way to do that is to
do take a helicopter tour take a
helicopter that's gonna land you high in
the mountains so that you can go
snowshoe around some gorgeous peaks and
views
welcome to bath
and if you love adventure you have to
come here and you have to get on the
hills there are three hills here within
the National Park
there's nor K there's Lake Louise and
there is Sunshine Village and we got to
ski these hills and man it was amazing
another thing that you have to do if you
come to Bath summer or winter is go to a
backcountry Lodge Banff National Park is
massive and to truly get an idea of the
scope and scale and beauty you need to
go to the backcountry and we went to
Sundance Lodge and the way we got there
was with a ten kilometer cross-country
ski if you aren't if you're a lot like
us and not great cross-country skiers I
recommend snowshoeing we snow shootout
and it was fast and it was a lot of fun
we had an amazing time here in Banff
National Park in Alberta doing
everything from snowshoeing to heli
skiing to dog sledding having some great
food and some great spa experiences if
you're looking for the all-encompassing
winter vacation Banff National Park has
everything you need
if you like this don't forget to
